UI_visible_response: Huang Xueqin, also known as Sophia Huang Xueqin, advocated for women's rights and was involved in campaigns to provide support and assistance to survivors of sexual assault3. traffic_visible_response: Huang Xueqin, also known as Sophia Huang Xueqin, advocated for women's rights and was involved in campaigns to provide support and assistance to survivors of sexual assault [[3]]. She was also dedicated to the advocacy for anti-sexual harassment law [[1]]. Additionally, she played a significant role in sparking the #MeToo movement in China by shedding light on social issues [[5]].
